description.p: Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. The target must make a Constitution saving throw: DC:8 + proficiency bonus + Strength or Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target becomes dazed (dazed: has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws, can't take Reactions and loses the Dexterity bonus to their AC). On a successful save, the target doesn't get dazed. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

sheet.description: Bonus Action: Make a melee attack with your weapon's hilt. Target makes CON save (DC 8 + prof + STR or DEX mod) or becomes dazed. Damage: 1d4 kinetic.

description.p: Slash: Action; When wielding double bladed weapon, make a melee attack that hits in a 15 feet horizontal line in front of you. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

sheet.description: Action: Attack all targets in a 15-foot horizontal line with your double-bladed weapon. Damage: weapon damage (no modifier).

description.p: Blast: Action; Blast multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

sheet.description: Action: Blast targets in a cone. DC 8 + prof + DEX save for half damage. Damage: weapon damage + DEX modifier.

description.p: Flame: Action; Flame multiple targets in a 15 feet line in front of you. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes weapon damage + weapon modifier(s) and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn.

sheet.description: Action: Flame targets in a cone. DC 8 + prof + Dex save for half damage and reduced burning.

description.p: Whip: Action; Use the fiber cord whip attachment. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier). On a failed save, the target is restrained. While restrained, the target can use an action on their turn to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). On a failed save, they remain restrained. On a successful save, they are freed. You can't use bonus actions or hold something in that hand while restraining someone.

sheet.description: Action: Use the whip attachment to restrain a target.
